title: 820-2850 reboot each 5 seg
message:
Sometimes works ok and load OS X and sometime reboot each 5 seg.
I replaced cap as always 2 times and already tried different ram. Could be bad GPU?

title: 820-2850 reboot each 5 seg
message: Reboot after 5 seconds has nothing to do with GPU. Could be 100 things, not something you really want to mess with.
